name: Intro
_source: music;Lord Chief Justice Stronghart ~ Time-Keeper of the Law
speak;Oberon;We have King Sages in our cells, along with other rebels.|This should satisfy the Queen, I assume.
speak;Lucian;Marvelous, well done, your Majesty.|I'm certain she'd love the honours herself.
speak;Oberon;Now, you must keep your end of the deal.
speak;Lucian;Of course.|For the prosperity of both our nations.
speak;Emmanuel;So, you agree to act as a witness to our marriage?
speak;Emmanuel;Can we skip to 'I do'?|I have business to attend to.
speak;Oberon;You don't wish for a traditional wedding?
speak;Helia;I do...|I'll care for you, serve you-
speak;Helia;Might I come with you?|If it's official business, I must attend!
speak;Lucian;What a great idea.|The newlyweds can get to know each other better!
speak;Emmanuel;If you insist... darling.|Though, it's hush-hush.|No word of this to her Majesty.
speak;Lucian;Do you know what business he refers to?
speak;Oberon;It was just a ruse, so we could have time to discuss our plans.
speak;Lucian;Of course, how shrewd, your Majesty.|Unification is the only way.|Her Majesty is weak, unfit to rule Aurelia!|I could just... never get rid of her.
speak;Oberon;She is neither strong of body, or heart.
speak;Lucian;Precisely, Aurelia needs a powerful leader to rally behind!
speak;Oberon;Which is where the newly-weds come in?

speak;Lucian;Exactly, we can't have you at the helm.|That would look too uneven, Aurelia's pride ruined.|However, a couple that connects both our nations may work.|We would also have the leftover land of Arcei...
speak;Oberon;We would finally have plentiful resources...|My people would finally overcome the shadow of these valleys...|Though, Sir, what do you hope to gain here?
speak;Lucian;Helia is servile.|While those two lovebirds are our front...|I will maintain control behind the scenes.
speak;Oberon;That wasn't agreed upon, why shouldn't I have that privelege?
speak;Lucian;You lack the Aurelian heritage!|Our divine lineage spans several centuries.|Monsdor is but a blip in that timeline!
speak;Oberon;So... the question is...|How do we remove her Majesty?
speak;Lucian;My plan is already in motion, don't worry.|King Jevil of Palushin is on my side.
speak;SoldierRed;Your Majesty!|We have an Aurelian entourage seeking audience with you.|Including the new Archbishop!
speak;Oberon;Send them in.|You'd best hide yourself, Lucian.|Wouldn't want to be exposed, would you?
speak;Lucian;Of course, good luck, your Majesty.
speak;SoldierRed;The King would be glad to accept your request, Archbishop.
speak;SoldierRed;His Majesty is in the throne room.|I can take you to him.
speak;SoldierRed;Your group are free to enjoy their stay in the meantime.
speak;CorneliusA;Please be patient, everyone.|This is important diplomatic business.
speak;Max;Guess we should have a nosey around.
speak;Xeconis;Perhaps we check on Eff?|It's been a while since we've seen him...
speak;Max;Very true.|Probably best not to distrub the Archbishop either.|I don't want to be lectured...
speak;Xeconis;Though, I can't help but wonder...
speak;Max;That was a while ago...|I just don't like how shady it was.
speak;Xeconis;Now hang on, you owe me one, remember?
speak;Max;..|Right... I guess we can snoop.|But if he sees us, I'm running!
